hello: Open up App.js to start working on your app! Nice👨‍🎓👩‍🎓
ForgotPassword/To Reset: To reset your password, Please enter the Email you used to register your account
ForgotPassword/AnEmailWith: An Email with a reset password code will be sent if an account with the email provided exists
ForgotPassword/you might need to check t: you might need to check the junk folder
ForgotPassword/Please enter the 6 digit: Please enter the 6 digit code sent to your email
ForgotPassword/Enter a new password to r: Enter a new password to replace the old password
ForgotPassword/Now you can login in with: Now you can login in with your new password
ForgotPassword/your new password cannot: your new password cannot be the same as the old password
Register/Are you a student or a teacher: Are you a student or a teacher ?
Register/You can always add them later: You can always add them later
InputValidationError/invalid password:
• at least 8 characters long
• one uppercase letter
• one lowercase letter
• one number
